replies.body:
Nice! It's not the best mouse, but for the price I got it from and how good looking it is it's alright. I have a DeathAdder 2013, not the Chroma, and I love it. I've been told the right click breaks, so if it does I'm getting the ROG Gladius. It's basically a DeathAdded with better build quality, a DPI button, a better sensor, and you can replace the switches inside and tweak them. But it doesn't have green backlighting, so if I do buy it, I'll have to replace the LEDs and void the warranty , lol. I'm going for an RGB thing. Red- Headset (HyperX Cloud 2) Green- My mouse and keyboard- Cm Storm Devestator blue edition.  

I talk too much, you have my permission to drool, rip.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Yeah Im going to have lots of figurines and wall art on my setup, I binge watch a lot xd. I still recommend filling those walls uo with something (ex. my sister is an artist so she gave me a painting im going to use, or if you like documentaries about science I bet you could find something that you would like). Its just that I hate setups without personality but if you dont like posters or figurines then eh.

Oh and so far I have watched the walking dead, breaking bad, how i met your mother, friends, prison break, fullmetal alchemist brotherhood, attack on titan, soul eater,, Avatar tge last airbender and avatar the legend of korra, and a couple more. Im addicyed to tv :p

reply_to.body:
Nice! It's not the best mouse, but for the price I got it from and how good looking it is it's alright. I have a DeathAdder 2013, not the Chroma, and I love it. I've been told the right click breaks, so if it does I'm getting the ROG Gladius. It's basically a DeathAdded with better build quality, a DPI button, a better sensor, and you can replace the switches inside and tweak them. But it doesn't have green backlighting, so if I do buy it, I'll have to replace the LEDs and void the warranty , lol. I'm going for an RGB thing. Red- Headset (HyperX Cloud 2) Green- My mouse and keyboard- Cm Storm Devestator blue edition.  

I talk too much, you have my permission to drool, rip.

replies.body: We've been calling each other best friends for over a year now. Alot of Apollo members have also been joking about it alot. She really only opens up to me and when she does we have got very long sessions. Even through bad times when she gets all blue, I will always be there to help her and fix her. Everyday I am coming home there is nothing exciting me more then talking to her again. She always draws in such a high quality and so realistic, you can throw any idea at her. Here is a pic of her http://imgur.com/a/BzB90.
